title: Circulation of the Arizona Republic 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Day in the x axis and Circulation in the y axis.
The maximum Circulation 378602.0 is found at Day Sunday and the minimum is found at Daily where Day is 130283.0.
The difference of Circulation between the highest and lowest Day is 248319.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
Day Sunday has the highest Circulation and Daily has the lowest Circulation.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Day in the x axis and Circulation in the y axis.

max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
The maximum Circulation 378602.0 is found at Day Sunday and the minimum is found at Daily where Day is 130283.0.
The highest value at Day Sunday is 2.91x times more than the lowest value at Daily.
The average Circulation in all 2 Days is 254442.5.
